body.name: Zulay 17” x 13” Roll Up Drying Rack - Silicone-Coated Stainless Steel Over Sink Dish Drying Rack - Multipurpose Foldable Sink Rack for Kitchen Counter - Non-Slip, Heavy-Duty Drying Rack (Gray)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 38 mins
features: OVER THE SINK ROLL UP DRYING RACK: Keep countertops mess free by using our sink drying rack. It comes in different sizes: 20.5”(L) x 13”(W), 17.52”(L) x 11.2”(W), 17”(L) x 13”(W). Please measure your sink and choose the right size from our collection of dish drying racks. It makes a great addition to your kitchen accessories and rv accessories.

PREMIUM QUALITY: This roll up dish drying rack is made of high-quality rods covered with silicone, making it rust-resistant, non-slip, and strong enough to hold up to 44 lbs. It won’t bend or break, making it durable enough to last you a long time.

MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN: Use this foldable sink rack as a dish drainer for kitchenware such as pans, glasses, cups, cutlery, mugs, bowls, and more. It can also be used as an over the sink colander for fruits and vegetables, a trivet for hot pots or bakeware, a kitchen sink caddy, a cooling rack, a camping sink mat, or a sink cover.

SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: The 18 stainless steel bars, connected with silicone, make this folding dish rack easy to lay flat or rolled up for convenient storage in cabinets or drawers. Unlike bulky drying racks, it can help free up space on the countertop. Surprise your friends and family with this kitchen essential as a housewarming gift.

HEAT RESISTANT MATERIAL: The food-grade silicone has heat resistance of up to 240℃/464°F. This silicone drying rack is ideal for cooling down a hot pan or thawing frozen fruits and vegetables without any marks on your countertop. It is also dishwasher safe for quick cleaning.
HASSLE-FREE, ZULAY GUARANTEE: We are a family owned USA business that believes in providing customers with the best quality products. Our kitchen organizer is backed with a lifetime warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am so happy I discovered this over-the-sink drying rack
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the over-sink drying rack, which has been a game-changer in my kitchen. The design is sleek and minimalistic, which I love. It fits perfectly over my sink and saves so much counter space. The rack is sturdy, and I use it to hold pots and pans that I wash by hand. The water drains directly into the sink, which makes cleanup a breeze. I also appreciate the added bonus of the dish rack being rust-resistant and covered with silicon. Because it is covered in silicon, it can handle very hot pots, pans, and dishes right from the oven. I highly recommend the over-sink drying rack to anyone who wants to streamline their dishwashing process and save space in their kitchen. It has definitely made my life easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use. Easy to clean. Frees up counterspace.
reviews.reviewText: I have nearly 4 more square feet of counterspace that was freed up by replacing the countertop drainboard and dish rack with the over the sink drain rack. Ingenious! Rolls up and washes in the dishwasher and for storage in drawer or cabinet. Sturdy rods COMPLETELY covered by nonslip silicone. No mold-loving water accumulation on the counter or drainboard. Very happy with this product and ever other product I’ve purchased from Zulay. All excellent quality and with good design features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this dish rack. It is one of the better ones that I have had.. it holds up the weight of other things that I put on it while I am at the sink… like making soup and putting the food into the 6 quart Dutch oven to cook… works super. YOU won’t be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just awesome! Doesn't take up much space, dishes dry quickly . Roll it up, and put it out of sight!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm using it in the RV over the sink. Nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am glad I bought this. Fits perfect over the sink. It is sturdy easy to clean. I like that it rolls up so it is not always in the way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great.
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 of them & bought 1 for my daughter. We love them. Very convenient, good for a variety of users. From putting on dishes to dry. Putting your cutting board on it, to setting dishes on & under it in the sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves counter space
reviews.reviewText: Love this! Great addition to our kitchen - saves counter space for drying dishes. Perfect for light use and for drying wash cloths. Easy to clean.
Item est de bonne qualité. Pratique aussi pour mettre des légumes qu’on vient de laver. Je recommande ce produit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very simple device but very effective, perfect for adding extra worktop space in a small kitchen. Wish I'd thought of getting one years ago!!
Me encanto, cumple con mis expectativas, lo uso se escurren los trastes y luego lo puedo guardar en una gaveta y mi cocina se ve muy ordenada siempre, sin un escurridor aparatoso
Good value, gives extra space for air drying dishes, also works as place to put hot pan so won’t damage counter top.
Buen tamaño para mi espacio de cocina. Buena calidad. Buen peso y excelente soporte. Muy bueno
